name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in building and maintaining robust systems using **HTML**, **CSS**, **Redux**, and server-side technologies such as **Express**. Demonstrated expertise in database management with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, and implementing REST and GraphQL APIs.
Skilled in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and enhancing application performance while ensuring security compliance across multiple standards. Strong focus on CI/CD practices for streamlined development and deployment processes.
In addition, experienced in leveraging **Python** for backend development, and utilizing front-end frameworks for responsive design. Successful track record in aligning solutions with compliance standards, and building AI/ML-powered platforms with strong MLOps knowledge.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **React (17-18)** and **TypeScript** to develop responsive front-end applications, ensuring seamless user experience and performance optimization.
Implemented state management using **Redux** for efficient data flow and performance tracking across applications.
Designed and built back-end services with **Node.js** and **Express**, exposing secure **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs to enhance data accessibility and interactivity.
Constructed CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployment processes, utilizing tools like **Firebase** for crash analytics and performance monitoring.
Implemented data storage and management solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring robust data integrity and high performance under load.
Enhanced application security by integrating best practices and tools, achieving a **95%** pass rate on security checks and compliance validations.
Developed and maintained application performance benchmarks, achieving a **20%** increase in load speed as measured by **Lighthouse** metrics.
Ensured high-quality code and documentation through rigorous testing strategies using **Jest** for unit tests and **Cypress** for end-to-end testing.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align on project goals and requirements, facilitating efficient communication and timely delivery of project milestones.
Contributed to the development of user interface components in **HTML** and **CSS**, adhering to design specifications and ensuring accessibility standards were met with tools like **Axe**.

Utilized **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, **Redux**, **HTML**, and **CSS** to build interactive, high-performance front-end applications for financial tools and admin panels, ensuring responsive design and user engagement.
Implemented server-side functionalities using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)**, integrating **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs to enhance application interactivity and data retrieval.
Optimized database interactions by managing **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** systems, improving query performance by up to **30%** and ensuring data security and integrity.
Led the deployment of CI/CD pipelines utilizing tools for continuous integration and delivery, significantly reducing deployment times by **40%**.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to **microservices architecture**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems processing over **1 million** transactions monthly.
Developed secure and scalable back-end services in **Python** (FastAPI, Django), focusing on performance and security compliance best practices.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring seamless asynchronous communication across critical workflows.
Established industry-standard performance and security tests utilizing **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, achieving an average performance score improvement of **20%**.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing insights into transaction patterns and anomalies for operational efficiency.
Created efficient ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time data processing workflows.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive identification of suspicious activities based on user behavior and transactions.
Integrated ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to support model inference in backend services.

• Developed scalable and high-performance applications using **React** (18) and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experiences across web and mobile platforms.
• Engineered backend services with **Node.js** (Express) and **Python** (Django, FastAPI), focusing on responsive data retrieval via **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**.
• Integrated RESTful and GraphQL APIs to facilitate smooth data transactions between frontend and backend, ensuring modular architecture and clear data flow.
• Employed CI/CD strategies to streamline deployments, boosting system reliability and reducing release times by up to **50%**.
• Implemented security best practices using OAuth 2.0 and secure coding standards, ensuring data protection and compliance with GDPR for over **100,000** user accounts.
• Conducted performance monitoring through tools like **Lighthouse** and **Axe**, optimizing applications to achieve at least **90%** scores in performance metrics.
• Harnessed caching techniques to improve application speed, achieving a **30%** reduction in database load via **Redis** for session management.
• Engaged in rigorous testing protocols to maintain code quality, with **100%** unit test coverage in critical modules employing **Redux** for state management.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver results with a focus on both front-end and back-end integration, contributing to platform stability and user satisfaction.
• Drove the adoption of modern UI frameworks and best practices for responsive design, improving accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 standards.
